title: The Dominion of Light
description: Olivia Gordon is hit with devastating news at the start of her senior year in high school and is confronted with a new reality revealed in a dying family member's last breath. She has to face a planet that is self-destructing, a government that has fallen into chaos and a parent on a murderous rampage. While traveling with an unlikely group, Olivia attempts to reach her ultimate destination while learning about trust, friendship, and the secret she was left with. In the midst of Armageddon will Olivia find love? Will she reach her destination? Will she survive?
author: Nicole  Murphy
